Description: Glazed composition shabti of Wahibra born of Nesnub with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed arms in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the incised seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a panel of incised hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
